title:
Elon just revealed exactly how the X algorithm works

I spent the last 14 hours straight reading...

extra.content:
Elon just revealed exactly how the X algorithm works

I spent the last 14 hours straight reading all 400,000 lines of code of the brand new X algorithm

What I read blew me away

Here's everything you need to know about how to go viral and if you can still get shadowbanned: thread https://t.co/OLsWH6zkNJ
extra.content_html: Elon just revealed exactly how the X algorithm works I spent the last 14 hours straight reading all 400,000 lines of code of the brand new X algorithm What I read blew me away Here's everything you need to know about how to go viral and if you can still get shadowbanned: thread https://t.co/OLsWH6zkNJ

thread_tweets.content:
Let's start with the most controversial part of the X algorithm from 2 years ago: tweepcred

Many have been asking me for years if it's still a thing

Now we have a definitive answer: yes

Tweepcred is still everywhere in the code

What is Tweepcred and how does it work? https://t.co/2EKnLk6jBg
thread_tweets.content_html: Let's start with the most controversial part of the X algorithm from 2 years ago: tweepcred Many have been asking me for years if it's still a thing Now we have a definitive answer: yes Tweepcred is still everywhere in the code What is Tweepcred and how does it work? https://t.co/2EKnLk6jBg

thread_tweets.content:
Tweepcred is X's reputation system

Based on your behavior, you get a tweepcred score

It determines your reach

Break the algo rules, your score goes down and your reach disappears

What are the rules of the X algo though? Glad you asked... https://t.co/T1QplSyYlv
thread_tweets.content_html: Tweepcred is X's reputation system Based on your behavior, you get a tweepcred score It determines your reach Break the algo rules, your score goes down and your reach disappears What are the rules of the X algo though? Glad you asked... https://t.co/T1QplSyYlv

thread_tweets.content:
Post offensive text? 80% reach reduction

Offensive username? 80% reach reduction

All caps tweet? That's seen as shouting. Major penalization.

Include links? Yup, penalized https://t.co/8RafZA8lbT
